Use both date pickers on this page:
1. 'Select Date' picker: Click the input to open the calendar popup. Navigate to March 2024 using the month/year navigation arrows. Click day 15 to select March 15, 2024. The input should show '03/15/2024'.
2. 'Date And Time' picker: Click the second input. Navigate to December 2025. Click day 25. Select 10:00 from the time list. The input should show a date/time including December 25, 2025.
